weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions
Class SymmetricalUncertainty

java.lang.Object
  weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.DistanceFunctionForSSF
      weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.PreBuiltDistanceMatrix
          weka.attributeSelection.ssf.distanceFunctions.SymmetricalUncertainty
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, DiscreteDistance, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
SymmetricalUncertaintySupervised
public class SymmetricalUncertainty
extends PreBuiltDistanceMatrix
implements DiscreteDistance, java.io.Serializable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

Symmetrical Uncertainty. For more informatio see: William H. Press, Brian P. Flannery, Saul A. Teukolsky, William T. Vetterling (1990). Numerical Recipes in C: The Art of Scientific Computing. .

BibTeX: 

 @book{Press1990,
    author = {William H. Press and Brian P. Flannery and Saul A. Teukolsky and William T. Vetterling},
    title = {Numerical Recipes in C: The Art of Scientific Computing},
    year = {1990}
 }

Valid options are: 

 -F <discretizer spec>
  Specify the discretizer algorithm for continuous features

See Also:
